title: Champ select screen not showing champs
body: Not able to select a champ at the champ select screen. It timeouts and I am banned for the next games where the same problem exists. Please help.

replies.body: Sometimes the main issue behind those champion select freezes is actually some kind of odd disconnection between your network and our servers. Double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly for anything that needs to be updating, but pay extra attention to port forwarding/DNS/and firewalls.
